column1: As Hoosiers come together this Thanksgiving it's important to remember what we have. Be thankful and have a safe and blessed #Thanksgiving2020! https://t.co/CN5yGz8JFs

They truly believe this stuff. Democrats wake up. Don’t let AOC control the narrative. https://t.co/lceqrWnxnZ
Great news about the @pfizer vaccine. That said they clearly held up this information until after the election in order to help defeat @realDonaldTrump. Congress should investigate?
